Reachtaíocht maidir le Cáin Fháltas Caipitiúil
Capital Acquisitions Tax was introduced in the Capital Acquisitions Tax Act 1976 and amended in subsequent finance acts
Tugadh Cáin Fháltas Caipitiúil isteach leis an Acht um Cháin Fháltas Caipitiúil, 1976 agus leasaíodh í in achtanna airgeadais ina dhiaidh sin

The relevant legislation was consolidated in the Capital Acquisitions Tax Consolidation Act 2003. The guidance notes incorporate changes that have been made by Finance Acts up to and including the Finance Act, 2006

Rinneadh an reachtaíocht ábhartha a chomhdhlúthú san Acht Comhdhlúite Cánach Fáltas Caipitiúil 2003, pdf Tá athruithe a rinneadh sna hAchtanna Airgeadais suas go dtí an tAcht Airgeadais 2006, agus an tAcht sin san áireamh clúdaithe sna nótaí treorach
When Capital Acquisitions Tax was introduced in the Capital Acquisitions Tax Act 1976, it replaced a system of death duties
Nuair a tugadh Cáin fháltas caipitiúil isteach leis an Acht um Cháin Fháltas Caipitiúil, 1976, cuireadh in ionad córas dleachtanna báis é
Capital acquisitions tax applies to gifts taken on or after 28 February 1974 and to inheritances taken on or after 1 April 1975
Baineann Cáin fháltas caipitiúil le tabhartais a tógadh an 28 Feabhra 1974 nó dá éis agus le hoidhreachtaí a tógadh an 1 Aibreán 1975 nó dá éis
The tax became a self-assessment tax in 1989
Rinneadh cáin fhéinmheasúnaithe den cháin i 1989
A probate tax was imposed on estates of deceased persons in the Finance Act 1993, but that tax was abolished in the Finance Act 2001
Gearradh cáin phrobháide ar eastáit daoine nach maireann san Acht Airgeadais, 1993, ach díothaíodh an cháin sin in Acht Airgeadais, 2001
The Capital Acquisitions Tax Consolidation Act 2003 is divided into 12 parts
12 chuid atá san Acht Comhdhlúite Cánach Fáltas Caipitiúil 2003
The main subjects of the 12 parts are as follows:
Is iad seo a leanas na príomhábhair atá faoi chaibidil sa 12 chuid:
how property is to be valued for capital acquisitions tax purposes
conas atá maoin le luacháil chun críocha cáin fháltas caipitiúil
general provisions relating to gifts and inheritances
forálacha ginearálta a bhaineann le tabhartais agus oidhreachtaí
dealing with returns and assessments
ag déileáil le tuairisceáin agus measúnuithe
dealing with payment of tax, interest and penalties
ag déileáil le cáin, ús agus pionóis a íoc
provisions dealing with appeals
forálacha ag déileáil le hachomhairc
exemptions from gift and inheritance tax
díolúintí ó cháin bhronntanais agus oidhreachta
the various reliefs, i.e
na faoisimh éagsúla, .i
agricultural relief, business relief and other miscellaneous reliefs
faoiseamh talmhaíochta, faoiseamh gnó agus faoisimh ilghnéitheacha eile
miscellaneous provisions relating to capital acquisitions tax
forálacha ilghnéitheacha a bhaineann le cáin fháltas caipitiúil
repeals, the commencement of the Act and transitional provisions
aisghairmeacha, tosach feidhme an Achta agus forálacha idirthréimhseacha

The Finance Act 2007 introduced changes regarding the dwellinghouse exemption to the Capital Acquisitions Tax Consolidation Act 2003. The 2010 Finance Act introduced a number of administrative changes in CAT,
